info.name: Konachan, Yande.re wider style.
info.description: This style make safebooru, konachan.(com/net) yande.re etc. wider, also it removes page switchers because it designed to be used with Autopagerize which loads them automatically on scroll, which gives you infinite scroll ^-^. Autopagerize i use with this style, also if you like you can get extension for Firefox, Chrome
